meanings.definition: A person who receives an award.
meanings.sent1: The awardees were honored at the ceremony.
meanings.sent2: All the awardees looked happy and proud.
meanings.sent3: The awardees celebrated their achievements with a big party.
meanings.sent4: The awardees shone like stars in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The awardees' smiles lit up the room.

meanings.sent1: We invited all the awardees to the event.
meanings.sent2: The awardees' names were announced one by one.
meanings.sent3: The awardees formed a line to receive their certificates.
meanings.sent4: The awardees stood out in the crowd like bright flowers.
meanings.sent5: The awardees' achievements inspired others to do their best.
